## Goal
Implement trending posts, hot topics, rising communities, and personalized recommendations to boost engagement and content discovery.

## Tasks
- [ ] Design and implement trending algorithm (engagement velocity)
- [ ] Add backend endpoints for trending posts, topics, and communities
- [ ] Create frontend UI for trending section and recommendations
- [ ] Integrate keyword extraction and topic discovery
- [ ] Build recommended communities logic based on user interests
- [ ] Write tests for trending algorithm and recommendations

## Acceptance Criteria
- Trending and discovery features work as described in [parent issue](./community-engagement-core.md)
- Trending posts and topics update dynamically
- Recommendations are personalized and accurate
